name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, in Zhengzhou, Henan, affected by Kangqiao’s bankruptcy, people went to the group’s headquarters to protest and demand repayment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The official WeChat account of the Hubei People's Government confirmed that @XisMoments is Xi Jinping's official overseas Twitter account.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@BQJJW Yesterday I blocked all the people who commented with the two tags in the picture.
I saw you said you deleted it, so I will help you release it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @XisMoments However, this account is currently in comment-ban mode.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hubei released a statement saying that "Xi's Moments" is "China's highest platform for external propaganda"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, migrant workers held up a banner downstairs of Xi'an Center: Huayu Dongyuan Yuejing, give me back my hard-earned money

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @amancalled2 Actually there is, but this account is banned from commenting, so I can’t comment on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, a 92-year-old man was found burning straw by district leaders and wrote a self-criticism.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, victims of Zhongzhi and Zhongrong Trust in Beijing continued to petition the Beijing Regulatory Bureau and were once again violently treated by black-clad security guards. Some of the victims were once again carried away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 5, Lishui, Zhejiang
Because of CITIC Bank's illegal transfer of funds, the Lishui Evergrande Yuelan Bay project was left unfinished. Victims gathered in front of CITIC Bank to demand repayment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, in front of the Anzhou District Government in Mianyang, Sichuan, the owners of unfinished buildings held banners to protest and were violently treated by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, the Jialing District of Nanchong City, Sichuan Province established a charity association. The local Education, Science and Sports Bureau required the launch of a "Charity Month" fundraising campaign, requiring not only teachers to scan the code to donate, but also students to donate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, the owners of unfinished buildings in Beihai City, Guangxi Province, went to the municipal government to defend their rights, demanding to "see the secretary and get their houses." The owner's T-shirt was printed with "Beihai government, please make decisions for the people." During the process, there was a scuffle with the police. The owner who was guarded by the police sat on the ground and cried: Why don't you care about the people who cheated us of our money, but bully the weak like us.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On September 5, in preparation for the Asian Games, the local police station in Hangzhou notified and organized security guards in each community to patrol with steel forks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
Comparison between Chinese student dormitories and foreign student dormitories

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 4, the Fuxing Siku Project Property Management Center of Shanghai Real Estate Hotel Management Co., Ltd. issued a notice that all windows and balconies facing the Huangpu River need to be closed on the evening of September 5, and people are not allowed to stand in front of the windows.
The reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 4, Jiutai City, Jilin Province
Many retired teachers went to the government to petition because they did not receive the corresponding pensions
